reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Recoil w/ flavor barrel, Dual fused claptons @ .26 ohms. 60 watt

**Testing:** Wonder Flavours: Caramel Rice Crispy Treats @ 5% 1 day steep

**Flavor Description:**
 Sweet grainy caramel with a touch of cinnamon. This is pretty true to its name. The caramel is very smooth and rich and there is a grainy note which would be the rice crispies. I am pleasantly surprised by the light sweet cinnamon note that you get on the tail end of the exhale. It isn't overpowering at all just a light bakery cinnamon that really does wonders for this mix.

**Off-flavors:** No off flavors here, it is a pretty authentic flavor

**Throat Hit:** Very easy on the throat, smooth exhale

**Uses & Pairings:**  This could be a very good stand alone vape. I could also see this being used in bakeries as the grainy aspect would blend in perfectly and add a nice caramel and cinnamon flavor to any cookie, cake, or even custard or cream as it is not too grainy. 

**Notes:**
This flavor is very sweet. I think if you add just a touch of ap or tpa rice crunchies to better augment the grainy aspect you would have a very good dessert mix. The mouthfeel is nice and thick as well, almost like you can chew the rice crispy treat.

**Second Opinions:**
Being as this is a fairly new company there isn't any other notes or reviews to help me out. Please if you have differing opinions leave a comment as I would love to get some other people's take on this flavor. More WF flavor reviews to come.
